mapper.select: SELECT id, filename, storage_path AS storagePath, uploader_id AS uploaderId, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt, size, mime_type AS mimeType, is_public AS isPublic FROM files WHERE uploader_id = #{fileId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files (id, filename, storage_path, uploader_id, created_at, size, mime_type) VALUES (#{id}, #{filename}, #{storagePath}, #{uploaderId}, NOW(), #{size}, #{mimeType})
mapper.select: SELECT CAST(id AS CHAR) AS id, filename, storage_path AS storagePath, CAST(uploader_id AS CHAR) AS uploaderId, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt, CAST(size AS CHAR) AS size, mime_type AS mimeType FROM files WHERE id = #{id}
